packages.name: Warm-up Shots
packages.description: Simple, fun questions and easy dares to get the party started. No surprises—just pure fun!

packages.name: First Date Flirt
packages.description: Gentle and playful challenges for new couples. Sparks guaranteed!

packages.name: Hot & Spicy
packages.description: Provocative questions and daring actions for experienced couples. Heat things up!

packages.name: Total Chaos
packages.description: Wild, unpredictable challenges that break every rule. Only for the bravest!

packages.name: Adult Kindergarten
packages.description: Ridiculous and hilarious tasks suitable for any crowd—even parents!

packages.name: Bottom of Truth
packages.description: Bold questions revealing your group's deepest secrets. Dare to face the truth?

packages.name: Guys Gone Wild
packages.description: Testosterone-fueled challenges: sports, adrenaline rushes, and cheeky dares. Perfect for a boys’ night!

packages.name: Girls' Night Secrets
packages.description: Beauty challenges, hilarious confessions, and intimate gossip. For ladies only!

packages.name: Insanity Mode
packages.description: Extreme tasks pushing your limits to the edge. Not for the faint-hearted!

packages.name: Tipsy Trivia
packages.description: Trivia with a twist: wrong answers mean drinking. Test your wits under pressure!

packages.name: Snack Attack
packages.description: Crazy food and drink challenges. Mix, drink, and laugh your way through!

packages.name: Never Have I Ever
packages.description: Classic drinking game revealing everyone's wildest secrets. Who’s the most experienced?
